text: Lincoln Carter Almond (June 16, 1936 – January 3, 2023) was an American attorney and politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. Almond served as United States Attorney for the District of Rhode Island from 1969 to 1978 and 1981 to 1993 and later the 72nd Governor of Rhode Island, serving from 1995 to 2003. Almond died on January 3, 2023, at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * University of Rhode Island Biography – Lincoln Almond * Brown University Oral History Project Category:1936 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Lawyers from Rhode Island Category:Boston University alumni Category:Governors of Rhode Island Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Pawtucket, Rhode Island
title: Lincoln Almond
